task.summary: Correct the Conflict of Table Name ( Redeclare)
Correct the Conflict of Class Name ( Redeclare)
Add Register Controller Add Register View Pages
Modify Register Controller Could Probably Reach the Basic Insert Function in Registering

# NOTE #
We use validation to check the form input; however, the variable $errors should be dumped as expected, it doesn't work.
We changed the route.php content, moving the register route control to middleware; thus, we have the error msg.
Add custom validation messages and update the index.blade.php content

Test for github settings
Nothing changes
Change the active class at navi bar
1. FIx the login page 2. Modify the URL (regPrimary -> register-primary etc.)
1. Fix the table "tcr_details": remove the "name" column uniqueness and set the "account_id" to be unique 2. Also add the unique properties to column "account_id" of table "tcr_properties"
1. Move views of generalLogin and consoleLogin into middleware section 2. Update layout.general
1. Remove the Primary and Junior Registration Differences. 2. Add Verify Code and Account Verify Features. 3. Add SMS Verification 4. Add Authentication
